reviews.review_msg: Megan is great,  a lab with her was a dream come true. She is so caring.

Dr. Barker is a great prof! She's very understanding, extremely helpful during labs, and always explains things clearly. The final exam for the lab portion was based completely on the labs done during lab time and on the lab manual given at the beginning of the semester. She's very understanding if you hand something in late, which is nice.

Overall Megan was a really good prof. Although she was often late to the lab, her pre-lab talks were very informative and she explained concepts really well. Equal participation between group members is really important in her lab class.
Barley was a great lab instructor.  She was very helpful and clear in her explanations.  Always willing to help.  Labs were fun and pretty easy, final was fair.
Dangerously Helpful, Never hesitate to ask him any questions!!! Amazingly AWESOME teacher, if he did the lectures BISC studies would be heaven.
Excellent professor! He intends for his students to learn the material. You don't even need to ask and he'll come explain certain concepts during lab.
